about_the_game:
"Craft Wars" is a heart-pounding multiplayer VR shooter, where you, the player, become the designer and the mastermind of your own weapon arsenal!

You model every aspect of your weapon by free-form hand placing 3D pixel blocks to give your weapon any visual look you desire! Each block has its unique properties, directly influencing your weapon's performance.

Bamboozle opponents with crazy fun contraptions or become the subject of envy for everyone with your immaculate weapon designs and tactical brilliance. Every new fight is a chance to experiment with novel weapons or fine-tune your playstyle.



Game Features:

1. Custom Weapons Crafting: Say goodbye to generic weapons. Forge your destiny by meticulously constructing your firearms using an extensive array of blocks. Each block has its unique properties, directly influencing your weapon's performance. Experiment, adapt, and build the perfect weapon tailored to your style of play.



2. Character Customization: Unleash your creativity and make your mark in the game by customizing your own avatar. With a wide variety of accessories, clothes, and body customization options, you can create a unique character that reflects your personality and style. Stand out on the battlefield with a one-of-a-kind appearance that sets you apart from other players.



3. Choose Your Style: Pick your preferred playstyle with two primary weapon types: pistols and SMGs. Will you be a precision sharpshooter with a finely-tuned pistol, or a rapid-fire specialist with a customized SMG? The choice is yours, and your creativity knows no bounds.

4. Dynamic Multiplayer: Compete against friends and players worldwide in heart-pounding multiplayer modes. Engage in tactical team-based skirmishes or embrace the chaos of free-for-all battles. Your weapon, your skills, and your teamwork are the keys to victory.

5. Block Variety: Explore a wide range of blocks, each with its own unique properties. Combine them to fine-tune attributes such as damage, accuracy, recoil, and more. The possibilities are limitless, ensuring that each battle offers new strategic opportunities.

6. Strategy Meets Action: "Craft Wars" transcends traditional shooting games by emphasizing strategy and adaptability. Plan your loadout, craft your weapons, and outsmart your adversaries with cunning tactics. Your decisions will be the game-changer in every battle.

--- Forge Your Weapon, Fight for Victory! ---

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: Steam VR, Oculus Rift, Oculus Quest 2
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i9 9900K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 3060 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: Steam VR, Oculus Rift, Oculus Quest 2

short_description: Duck pistol? Spaceship shaped shotgun? That sci-fi sniper rifle you drew as a kid? In “Craft Wars” you model every aspect of your weapon! With free-form, hand-placed 3D pixel blocks, you can craft anything you imagine! Unleash your creativity and engage in heart-pounding VR multiplayer shooter!
